content.query:
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://adlsaccountgen2.blob.core.windows.net/bronze/csv_Orders',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) WITH (
    OrderID VARCHAR(500),
    CustomerID VARCHAR(500),
    OrderDate VARCHAR(500),
    Channel VARCHAR(500),
    ProductID VARCHAR(500),
    Quantity VARCHAR(500),
    UnitPrice VARCHAR(500),
    Status VARCHAR(500),
    Region VARCHAR(500),
    WarehouseID VARCHAR(500)

) AS rows;
